documents.document: RT @m_brosnan: Clifford will get his due praise. But Kerry were gone if not for Kieran Donaghy. Phenomenal. He's 35 and last month was out…

A word on the Limerick team hotel this morning. The most open and helpful ‘morning after’ I’ve ever covered. Players, management, family & fans unbelievable. No wonder they’re loved so much by neutrals.
